settings.html: The JVC MS-S500 is a 21.3" monitor designed for medical imaging and breast image diagnosis. It provides reliable brightness and contrast image quality without unnecessary hype. The Independent Sub-pixel Drive Technology offers 15 mega sub-pixel images, contributing to its functionality . It holds FDA 510(k) clearance for digital mammography and breast tomosynthesis. Practical features include Auto Text Mode, a built-in sensor for self-calibration, a protective glass filter with anti-reflective coating, and an integrated reading light. The monitor also incorporates a space-saving stand, a low blue light panel, and DisplayPort 1.2 for convenient wiring connections. The JVC MS-S500 prioritizes precision and reliability without exaggerated claims.

settings.title: Improved Diagnostic Visibility
settings.content: MS-S500 comes with 1,000 cd/m² calibration to make it the best solution for breast image diagnosis. With a maximum luminance of 3000 cd/m², a long lifetime is secured even in this preset. The brighter screen dramatically increases the number of perceptual grayscale steps to improve the visibility of microcalcifications, tumors, and structures.

settings.title: Independent Sub-pixel Drive Technology
settings.content: This unique technology enables MS-S500 to render 15 mega sub-pixel images, exceeding the current standards for primary breast image diagnosis. MS-S500 is cleared for FDA 510(k) for the use of digital mammography and breast tomosynthesis.

settings.title: Auto Text Mode
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 is equipped with an innovative feature known as Auto Text Mode. This feature is designed to enhance user comfort and reduce eye strain during prolonged use. When viewing patient lists and reporting applications, the brightness of the display is automatically adjusted to optimal levels. This automatic adjustment ensures that the screen’s brightness is always at the most comfortable level for the user, reducing the risk of eye strain and fatigue. The Auto Text Mode is a testament to JVC’s commitment to user comfort and health, making the MS-S500 not just a tool, but a thoughtful companion for healthcare professionals. This feature underscores the monitor’s blend of advanced technology with user-centric design, further solidifying the MS-S500’s position as a leader in the field of medical display technology.

settings.title: Integrated QA Solution
settings.content:
Managing the daily operation of the Radiology department is now more simplified with QA Medivisor Agent’s calibration and QA standard testing capabilities, combined into an intuitive and easy-to-navigate user interface. This includes QA Medivisor Agent LE, a simplified calibration scheduling tool.
*Optional calibration kit CAL-016 is required for standard QA testing.

settings.title: Self-calibration
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 monitor, equipped with an integrated color front sensor, self-calibrates to the DICOM Part 14 Standard. This automated process occurs regularly, ensuring consistent, high-quality images. The self-calibration eliminates manual calibration, maintaining the monitor’s color accuracy over time. This is crucial in medical imaging where precise color representation is vital. The self-calibration feature enhances the monitor’s performance and longevity, making it a reliable, cost-effective choice for healthcare professionals. With the JVC MS-S500, users can trust they are viewing images that meet the highest standards of color accuracy and consistency. This monitor represents a significant advancement in display technology, offering an unparalleled viewing experience while adhering to industry standards. The JVC MS-S500 is a testament to JVC’s commitment to quality and innovation.

settings.title: Premium Design
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 showcases a sleek and slim design, emphasizing a modern aesthetic. Its minimalist approach is highlighted by an 11.25mm bezel width, enhancing its contemporary appeal. The slim bezel not only expands the viewing area but also adds a touch of elegance to the monitor. This design, combined with advanced technology, creates a harmonious blend of form and function. The straightforward yet sophisticated design effortlessly integrates into professional settings, making it an excellent choice for those desiring a modern appearance without sacrificing performance. The JVC MS-S500, with its refined design and slim bezel, reflects JVC's dedication to quality and innovation in display technology.

settings.title: Protective Glass Filter
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 is designed with a Protective Glass Filter to safeguard the monitor’s LCD panel. This robust glass filter serves as a shield, protecting the delicate LCD panel from potential damage. But it’s not just about protection; the glass filter also enhances the user experience. It comes with an anti-reflective coating, which minimizes glare and reflections, ensuring clear, unobstructed viewing even in brightly lit environments. This thoughtful addition underscores JVC’s commitment to delivering a product that is not only durable and reliable but also user-friendly. The Protective Glass Filter is yet another feature that sets the JVC MS-S500 apart, making it a preferred choice for professionals seeking a high-quality, durable, and user-friendly display monitor.

settings.title: Reading Light
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 comes with an integrated reading light, a feature designed to enhance user convenience and comfort. This reading light illuminates your keyboard, making it easier to work in low-light conditions. But the thoughtfulness doesn’t stop there. The monitor is also equipped with an ambient sensor that automatically adjusts the brightness of the reading light according to the room’s lighting conditions. This means you get just the right amount of light, whether you’re working in a brightly lit room or in the dark. This automatic adjustment prevents eye strain and ensures a comfortable viewing experience, no matter the environment. The integrated reading light and ambient sensor are examples of how the JVC MS-S500 combines advanced technology with user-centric design to deliver a superior user experience.

settings.title: Space Saving
settings.content: Acknowledging the significance of desk space, the JVC MS-S500 is crafted with a stand that occupies 25% less area compared to traditional models. This compact design not only conserves valuable desk space but also enhances the monitor's sleek and modern appearance. Despite its smaller footprint, the stand offers robust support, ensuring stability and durability for the monitor. This efficient use of space reflects JVC's commitment to creating products that are both technologically advanced and practical. The JVC MS-S500, with its space-saving stand, caters to professionals who prioritize both performance and workspace efficiency. It's another instance of JVC's innovation in aligning with the practical needs of today's professionals.

settings.title: Wire Management / DisplayPort Daisy Chains
settings.content: The monitor is equipped with DisplayPort 1.2, a feature that significantly simplifies wiring connections. The use of daisy chains allows for streamlined and efficient setup. This not only reduces clutter but also enhances the ease of use. Whether you’re setting up a single monitor or configuring a multi-monitor setup, the JVC MS-S500, with its DisplayPort 1.2 and daisy chain capability, makes the process straightforward and hassle-free.

settings.title: Built-in Sensor
settings.content: The JVC MS-S500 includes several front sensors to efficiently adjust your monitor to fit any reading environment. An ambient light sensor offsets the effects of ambient light to ensure optimal calibration, a color front sensor stabilizes luminance and color for consistent image quality, and the human presence sensor automatically switches to power save mode when you're away.

settings.title: Docs & Drivers
